message: Let's split it 50/50, a fair start to the game!
You're being too generous, I'll take the majority!
You wanted the majority, now it's my turn to take the lead!
You're getting desperate, I'll give you a slightly better deal!
I'm not getting any younger, time to take control of this game!
You're getting bold, but I'm not backing down yet!
It's now or never, Bob! Take it or leave it!
You're getting greedy, but I'll give you a last chance to be reasonable!
